main event: A civilian pilot reported observing a 40ft x 10ft object moving at approximately 1500 mph in Williamson, West Virginia on 11/18/1954.
interesting points: The object left a vapor trail 45 degrees above and 1 mile in length, which disappeared in approximately half a second.
The report mentions a visual observation, indicating that the pilot physically saw the object.
Specific coordinates and headings of the object's movements are included in the report.
The pilot was from Capital Airlines Inc and was flying near the International Airport in New Orleans, LA.
The report includes details of altitude, direction, and speed of the observed object at different times.
sighted object: a 40ft x 10ft object moving at 1500 mph
